Deck.Name: Invisible Stalker
Deck.OracleText:
Hexproof (This creature can't be the target of spells or abilities your opponents control.)
This creature can't be blocked.
Deck.Flavor_Text: "All that concerns me is the vampires' sense of smell and those freezing Nephalian nights."

Deck.Name: Cloud, Midgar Mercenary
Deck.OracleText:
When Cloud enters, search your library for an Equipment card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.
As long as Cloud is equipped, if an ability of Cloud or an Equipment attached to it triggers, that ability triggers an additional time.

Deck.Name: Magister Sphinx
Deck.OracleText:
Flying
When this creature enters, target player's life total becomes 10.
Deck.Flavor_Text: "These benighted worlds are thick with ignorance. I will educate them. They will listen, or they will die."

Deck.Name: Sharuum the Hegemon
Deck.OracleText:
Flying
When Sharuum enters, you may return target artifact card from your graveyard to the battlefield.
Deck.Flavor_Text: To gain audience with the hegemon, one must bring a riddle she has not heard.

Deck.Name: Esper Sentinel
Deck.OracleText: Whenever an opponent casts their first noncreature spell each turn, draw a card unless that player pays {X}, where X is this creature's power.
Deck.Flavor_Text: The more Esper changes, the more he refuses to.

Deck.Name: Stoneforge Mystic
Deck.OracleText:
When this creature enters, you may search your library for an Equipment card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.
{1}{W}, {T}: You may put an Equipment card from your hand onto the battlefield.

Deck.Name: Sword of Fire and Ice
Sword of Light and Shadow
Demonic Pact
Deck.OracleText:
At the beginning of your upkeep, choose one that hasn't been chosen —
• This enchantment deals 4 damage to any target and you gain 4 life.
• Target opponent discards two cards.
• Draw two cards.
• You lose the game.

Deck.Name: Lich's Mastery
Deck.OracleText:
Hexproof
You can't lose the game.
Whenever you gain life, draw that many cards.
Whenever you lose life, for each 1 life you lost, exile a permanent you control or a card from your hand or graveyard.
When Lich's Mastery leaves the battlefield, you lose the game.

Deck.Name: Fateful Handoff
Deck.OracleText: Draw cards equal to the mana value of target artifact or creature you control. An opponent gains control of that permanent.
Deck.Flavor_Text:
"Get the sylex to Urza at any cost. Tell him to fill it with memories of the land."
—Ashnod, to Tawnos

Deck.Name: Path to Exile
Deck.OracleText: Exile target creature. Its controller may search their library for a basic land card, put that card onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.

Deck.Name: All That Glitters
Deck.OracleText:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +1/+1 for each artifact and/or enchantment you control.
Deck.Flavor_Text: A faerie's glee at her trove quickly fades to contentment, then to boredom, then to an urge to steal more.

Deck.Name: Curiosity
Deck.OracleText:
Enchant creature
Whenever enchanted creature deals damage to an opponent, you may draw a card.
Deck.Flavor_Text: "Surely you know the joy of the hunt, my furry friend. My kind of hunt just takes a different form than yours."

Deck.Name: Glacial Fortress
Deck.OracleText:
This land enters tapped unless you control a Plains or an Island.
{T}: Add {W} or {U}.
Deck.Flavor_Text: Ships blown north in their voyage across the Stormwreck Sea become trapped in the unmelting ice.

Deck.Name: Drowned Catacomb
Deck.OracleText:
This land enters tapped unless you control an Island or a Swamp.
{T}: Add {U} or {B}.
Deck.Flavor_Text: None can tell how many vessels are tangled up on the sea floor—or how much treasure remains unclaimed.

Deck.Name: Isolated Chapel
Deck.OracleText:
This land enters tapped unless you control a Plains or a Swamp.
{T}: Add {W} or {B}.
Deck.Flavor_Text: Serra's blessing lies strongest upon Sursi, where her holy chapels are untouched even as the Cabal encroaches.

Deck.Name: Field of Ruin
Deck.OracleText:
{T}: Add {C}.
{2}, {T}, Sacrifice this land: Destroy target nonbasic land an opponent controls. Each player searches their library for a basic land card, puts it onto the battlefield, then shuffles.

Deck.Name: Stiltzkin, Moogle Merchant
Deck.OracleText:
Lifelink
{2}, {T}: Target opponent gains control of another target permanent you control. If they do, you draw a card.
Deck.Flavor_Text: "How about a three-piece combo of Hi-Potion, Ether, and Phoenix Pinion for 444 Gil?"

Deck.Name: Lavinia, Azorius Renegade
Deck.OracleText:
Each opponent can't cast noncreature spells with mana value greater than the number of lands that player controls.
Whenever an opponent casts a spell, if no mana was spent to cast it, counter that spell.
Deck.Flavor_Text: "I told Jace that Ravnica would fall apart if he didn't take his responsibilities seriously. I didn't want to be right."

SideBoard.Name: Sanctifier en-Vec
SideBoard.OracleText:
Protection from black and from red
When this creature enters, exile all cards that are black or red from all graveyards.
If a black or red permanent, spell, or card not on the battlefield would be put into a graveyard, exile it instead.

SideBoard.Name: Kor Firewalker
SideBoard.OracleText:
Protection from red
Whenever a player casts a red spell, you may gain 1 life.
SideBoard.Flavor_Text: "A river of lava is just another river to cross."

SideBoard.Name: Rest in Peace
SideBoard.OracleText:
When this enchantment enters, exile all graveyards.
If a card or token would be put into a graveyard from anywhere, exile it instead.

SideBoard.Name: Unlicensed Hearse
SideBoard.OracleText:
{T}: Exile up to two target cards from a single graveyard.
Unlicensed Hearse's power and toughness are each equal to the number of cards exiled with it.
Crew 2

SideBoard.Name: Spell Pierce
SideBoard.OracleText: Counter target noncreature spell unless its controller pays {2}.
SideBoard.Flavor_Text: The druid's aim was dead on. But their choice of target was dead wrong.

SideBoard.Name: Duress
SideBoard.OracleText: Target opponent reveals their hand. You choose a noncreature, nonland card from it. That player discards that card.
SideBoard.Flavor_Text:
"Give of yourself, for *compleation* awaits the cleansed."
—Nokar, priest of Sheoldred

SideBoard.Name: Mystical Dispute
SideBoard.OracleText:
This spell costs {2} less to cast if it targets a blue spell.
Counter target spell unless its controller pays {3}.
SideBoard.Flavor_Text: "Poor, lost mage. Your feet are on land, yet you're in over your head, aren't you?"

SideBoard.Name: Disenchant
SideBoard.Flavor_Text: Even millennia later, some war machines from the devastating Brothers' War continue to function. Thankfully, the weapons meant to destroy them still work too.

SideBoard.Name: Kaya's Guile
SideBoard.OracleText:
Choose two —
• Each opponent sacrifices a creature of their choice.
• Exile all opponents' graveyards.
• Create a 1/1 white and black Spirit creature token with flying.
• You gain 4 life.
Entwine {3} (Choose all if you pay the entwine cost.)
